actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for physician extender and other services furnished by rural health clinics meeting health, organizational, and safety requirements.

summary.text: Rural Health Services Act - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for rural health clinic services including physician extender services. Requires that such clinics meet such tests of reasonableness as the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare may find appropriate in order to be eligible for coverage.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for physician extender and other services furnished by rural health clinics meeting health, organizational, and safety requirements.
